text: Mei geren de qianmian he houmian, dou you xuduo jiezhong er lai de tianshi, tamen feng'an la de mingling lai jianhu ta. An la biding bu biangeng renhe minzhong de qingkuang, zhidao tamen biangeng ziji de qingkuang. Dang an la yu jiang zaihai yu renhe minzhong de shihou, na zaihai shi buke kangju de. Chu an la wai, tamen jue wu baohu zhe
